mapper.insert: INSERT INTO absent (class_id, student_id, log_id, absent, reason, part, absent_at) VALUES (#{class_id}, #{student_id}, #{log_id}, #{absent}, #{reason}, #{part}, #{absent_at})
mapper.select: select count(*) from absent where log_id = #{log_id} and student_id = #{student_id}
select count(*) from absent order by absent_at desc
